name: Amalgamation (greenman4890)
description:
This is a horror game with a retro 3d inspiration but with modern things added to it.

Press tab to open your menu and see your controls
 
Navigate trough a spaceship where something has gone wrong.

Made by me and a friend who is not on itch for the horror gamejam

We definitely ran out of time and I was not able to implement everything I wanted to but it was fun to mess around with a retro inspired style.
